name: Backup_singers
text:
Backup singers
A pair of backup singers performed with James Hurley at the Roadhouse in Twin Peaks, Washington.
Biography
The two women performed the echo vocals for "Just You," a song performed by James Hurley which he had originally written in 1989 and played with Donna Hayward and Madeline Ferguson.
Behind the scenes
"Backup Singer #2" and "Backup Singer #3" were portrayed by Kelsey Bohlen and Rachael Bower. The original version of "Just You," featuring the vocals of Sheryl Lee and Lara Flynn Boyle, was reused for the second performance.
